# Aloha Media Studio

> Professional podcast production company in Eagle, Idaho offering full-service podcast creation for businesses and thought leaders.

Aloha Media Studio helps busy professionals launch and maintain high-quality podcasts without the technical hassle. We handle everything from content strategy and planning through multi-camera studio recording, professional post-production editing, and distribution to all major platforms including YouTube, Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and RSS feeds.

Our founder Nation Goetter and team have produced over 500 videos and generated more than 260,000 views for clients. We specialize in working with business owners, consultants, authors, and thought leaders who want to establish authority in their industry through podcasting.

## Why Choose Aloha Media Studio

Most podcasts fail not because of bad content, but because production is overwhelming. Recording, editing, thumbnails, show notes, distribution—it adds up fast. Business owners don't have time to learn video editing software or master audio mixing.

That's where we come in. We become your complete podcast production team. You focus on sharing your expertise and connecting with your audience. We handle everything else: the cameras, the lighting, the microphones, the editing, the publishing. When you work with us, launching a podcast becomes as simple as showing up and having a conversation.

## Our Process

1. **Plan**: We develop your content strategy, define your target audience, and create an episode roadmap that positions you as the authority in your niche.

2. **Record**: You come to our professional studio in Eagle, Idaho. We handle multi-camera setup, broadcast lighting, and professional audio capture. You just talk.

3. **Edit**: Our team handles post-production—video editing, audio mixing, color correction, thumbnail design, and show notes writing.

4. **Publish**: We distribute your episodes to YouTube, Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major platforms. Your podcast goes live without you lifting a finger.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**How much does podcast production cost?**
Professional podcast production typically costs $500-$2,500 per episode depending on complexity. Our full-service packages including studio recording, editing, and distribution to all major platforms average $1,500 per episode.

**How long does it take to launch a podcast?**
With our full-service production, most clients launch within 90 days. This includes content strategy and planning, recording your first 6 episodes, professional editing, and setting up distribution to all platforms.

**Do I need my own equipment?**
No. Our Eagle, Idaho studio includes professional cameras, lighting, microphones, and all equipment needed for high-quality production. You just show up and talk.

**What's included in a full-service package?**
Our packages include content strategy, episode planning, professional studio recording, video and audio editing, thumbnail creation, show notes, and distribution to YouTube, Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and RSS feeds.

**Can you help with an existing podcast?**
Yes. We work with both new and existing podcasts. Whether you need to upgrade your production quality, take over editing duties, or rebrand your show, we can help.
